high_descs: Turn to the right, walk to the door, turn to the left, and walk to the desk.
Pick up the box on the top shelf that is furthest to your right.
Turn to the left and walk to the bedside table.
Turn on the lamp that is on the top shelf of the desk and to your right.
Head to the desk on the right
Grab one of the containers that is at the top of the desk
Turn on the lamp that's on the desk
Hang a right at the bed and turn left at the wall to reach the wooden desk.
Pick up the brown clock on the top shelf of the desk to the right of another brown clock.
Turn left, walk around the chair and hang a right before the bed to face the desk.
Turn on the small lamp on the left corner of the shelf on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a clock by the light of a small lamp.
